subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Kotsay's two-run inside-the-park homer proved to be the deciding hit Wednesday in Oakland’s victory as the Athletics took a 2-0 lead in the best-of-five division series.
snippet: Mark Kotsay's two-run inside-the-park homer proved to be the deciding hit Wednesday in Oakland’s victory as the Athletics took a 2-0 lead in the best-of-five division series.
